pull.title: [qa] zapwallettxes: Wait up to 3s for mempool reload
pull.body: There had been intermittent test failures on zapwallettxes, as no time was allotted to reload the mempool.

events.message: [qa] zapwallettxes: Wait up to 3s for mempool reload

events.body:
tested ACK fadd0c16b6bd62e9d663d906755320ae089e02d3

I ran the test 100 times locally, and didn't hit any failures:

```
./test_runner.py $(for i in {1..100}; do echo -n 'zapwallettxes.py ' ; done)
...
ALL              | ✓ Passed  | 1096 s (accumulated) 
```

(however, running master 100 times also fails to hit the intermittent error, so it's not certain that this resolves the issue)
@jnewbery I think this is only apparent on systems with shared cpu and spinning disk.
